attributes.title: GAVE ME AIDS

attributes.title: Would be zero stars if it let me
attributes.review: This app took 2 days to download, when it finally did it proved to be filled with racist, homophobic, transphobic, and sexist content. It scared me. This app promotes bullying and is disgusting.

attributes.title: Underage Child
